name: 谢小希
greetingText: This is a 18th birthday wish from D:)!
wishText: The 18th, a new attitude and some peace of mind ~ ~
text1: Hope you'd like this little trick
textInChatBox: Happy 18th birthday to you! Many many joy blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
outroText: From winter to summer, friendship forever.
replayText: You can click, whenever you wanna watch it again.
